at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32

Class STM32SpiInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.RMCSControlComponent
      • at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.STM32SpiInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class STM32SpiInterface
extends RMCSControlComponent
implements java.lang.Runnable
    An Interface to control the data transmission to a STM32, that is connected through SPI.

    Used Pins for SPI communication:
    - MOSI _ GPIO12 _ Pin 19
    - MISO _ GPIO13 _ Pin 21
    - SCK __ GPIO14 _ Pin 23
    - GND __ ______ _ Pin 25
    - GND __ ______ _ Pin 6
    - TxD __ GPIO15 _ Pin 8
    - RxD __ GPIO16 _ Pin 10

    for pinout see: Raspberry Pi Pinout DON'T FORGET TO ENABLE SPI INTERFACE IN RASPI-CONFIG!
    Author:
    Boeck, Valiko

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static byte blink_left
      The byte that represents setting the left winker.
      private static byte blink_right
      The byte that represents setting the left winker.
      private static byte brake_off
      The byte that represents disabling of the back-lights.
      private static byte brake_on
      The byte that represents enabling of the back-lights.
      private static byte headlights_off
      The byte that represents disabling of front-lights.
      private static byte headlights_on
      The byte that represents enabling of front-lights.
      private static byte SendAcc_Start
      The byte value precede the acceleration/velocity value.
      private static byte SendAngle_Start
      The byte value precede the steering-angle value.
      private static byte SendCamPitch
      The byte value precede the camera-pitch-angle value.
      private static byte SendCamYaw
      The byte value precede the camera-yaw-angle value.
      private static byte SendLights_Start
      The byte value precede the lights values.
      private static byte SendUpdateSensorData
      The byte value to send to request a sensor-update.
      private int sensorUpdateInterval
      The time in milliseconds that should be waited between sensor-data-requests.
      private static boolean SPI_Activated
      true, if SPI-Communication should be enabled, otherwise false.

    • Constructor Detail

      • STM32SpiInterface

        public STM32SpiInterface(java.util.Collection<EDataType> controlTypes,
                         int sensorUpdateInterval)
        Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.
        Parameters:
        controlTypes - the list of EDataTypes that the SPI interface can process.
        sensorUpdateInterval - the time in milliseconds that should be waited between sensor-data-requests.

      • STM32SpiInterface

        public STM32SpiInterface(EDataType controlType,
                         int sensorUpdateInterval)
        Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.
        Parameters:
        controlType - the EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        sensorUpdateInterval - the time in milliseconds that should be waited between sensor-data-requests.

      • STM32SpiInterface

        public STM32SpiInterface(EDataType controlType1,
                         EDataType controlType2,
                         int sensorUpdateInterval)
        Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.
        Parameters:
        controlType1 - the first EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        controlType2 - the second EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        sensorUpdateInterval - the time in milliseconds that should be waited between sensor-data-requests.

      • STM32SpiInterface

        public STM32SpiInterface(EDataType controlType1,
                         EDataType controlType2,
                         EDataType controlType3,
                         int sensorUpdateInterval)
        Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.
        Parameters:
        controlType1 - the first EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        controlType2 - the second EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        controlType3 - the third EDataType that the SPI interface can process.
        sensorUpdateInterval - the time in milliseconds that should be waited between sensor-data-requests.

      • initialize

        Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.

      • updateControls

        public void updateControls(byte acceleration,
                           byte steeringAngle)
        Is used to update the values for steering angle and velocity of the car
        Parameters:
        acceleration - is used to set the velocity of the car, has to be between -100 and 100.
        steeringAngle - is used to set the steering angle of the car, has to be between -100 and 100.

      • updateCameraAngle

        private void updateCameraAngle(byte yaw,
                               byte pitch)
        Is used to update the values for the camera angles
        Parameters:
        yaw - is used to set the yaw angle of the camera, has to be between -100 and 100.
        pitch - is used to set the pitch angle of the camera, has to be between -100 and 100.

      • setBackLights

        private void setBackLights(boolean lightsOn)
        Turns the back-lights on or off
        Parameters:
